item.title: Events
item.description: Social contact is important for mental health and wellbeing, we hold regular eventâ€™s and encourage our members to meet up. We have a lovely bunch of friendly regulars, and all of our events are entirely optional and designed with inclusivity in mind, why not come along and get involved.
